thread.title: Growth in Banks’ ROEs Gets Boost From New Tax Law

author: Michael Rapoport
title: Growth in Banks’ ROEs Gets Boost From New Tax Law
text: Big banks posted strong and rising returns on equity in the first quarter, some as high as 15% — potentially a long-awaited sign that they’re finally able to focus on growth again, after the post-financial crisis years in which they had to concentrate on maintaining their stability and liquidity. So have the banks finally turned   WSJ City PM: Shire Faces Bidding Battle After £42 Billion Takeda Offer, What's Next for the Saudi-Russia Oil Pact? Next No Bed of Roses at Sleep Number
